title: (36633) A Bouciña - Unnamed Road
description: Nice, quiet place right on the river. Surrounded by nature.

title: (36630) Cambados - 1 Rúa Os Olmos
description: Laundry at a good price. You can't park in front but there are several car parks nearby.

title: (36630) Cambados - 21 Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
title_short: (36630) Cambados - 21 Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
description: Mini beach in front and a spectacular sunset and the center one step away

title: (36630) Cambados - 8 Rúa a Pacheca
description:
Small open field very close to the beautiful Cambados Cemetery.
without services in a dead end street, very quiet to spend the night if you visit Cambados, near the center.

title: (36633) Cambados - 106 EP-9506
description: Esplanade of land on the banks of the Umia River, picnic area on the other side of the river, 3 km from Cambados, very quiet to spend the night

title: (36636) Ribadumia - Rúa Portela
description: Place to stop for something to eat, short edge but quiet.

title: (36630) Cambados - 35 Rúa Muelle Santo Tome
description: On the port, parked along it. Quiet place, no traffic.

title: (36630) Cambados - 28 PO-550
description: Automatic laundry

title: (36630) Cambados - Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
title_short: (36630) Cambados - Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
description: Several car parks but banned on Wednesday and Saturday for any market. Beautiful location and lovely town. No service.

title: (36630) Cambados - 22 Avenida do Salnés
description: Day and night parking with supermarket nearby. You can walk to the center of town which has many monuments, squares and green areas to see. Do not leave the town without seeing the Fefiñanes square, the San Sadurniño tower and the Pastora mountain.

title: (36639) Cambados - Unnamed Road
description: Praia de Correlo, on the shore of the river. Views to the island of La Toja. Plain, of land and next to a forest and vineyards.

title: (36630) Cambados - 1 Rúa Carreira
description: Laundromat near the old town.

title: (36630) Cambados - 56-58 Rúa Pombal
description: A good place to park and park if Cambados is market day or are parties because the port parking will be closed to traffic and full of stands or booths. This place is made of asphalt and compacted earth, level and with shade; since it has a grove that protects it. It is very quiet and is next to the sports center. A small bike path starts here and it is very close to Tragove tide mill

title: (36639) Cambados - 55 Lugar Facho
description: Seaside. No beach fishing and stroll possible. quiet place we. no service.

title: (36634) Corvillón - 2 Lugar Cabana
description: Spectacular gas station, shower service and bathrooms better than in a spa, amazing. The shower costs 4 euros for 10 minutes, the best we have ever had. In addition, the bathrooms are on the same level, impressive. Very friendly and helpful staff. You can also refuel and wash the vehicle. A 10 for those of us on the road. Service until 10:00 p.m.

title: (36636) Ribadumia - 16 Rúa Outeiral
description: Playground with area to park and rest. Drinking water source and beautiful view of a eucalyptus forest. Some bar or restaurant nearby. With hardly any traffic.

title: (36639) Cambados - 64 Lugar Facho
description: Good place to spend a night. Access by dirt road, motorhomes without problem.

name: Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
title: (36634) Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
description: Motorhome area in Cambados. Payment by card and phone only. Possibility of reservation subject to availability. Located in the capital of Albariño wine and just a 10-minute walk along the coastal path from the Monumental and Restoration Area of Cambados. The area is in a quiet area next to a pond with a mill and on an avenue full of services such as 24-hour supermarkets, gas stations and 24-hour laundries. Water and sewage are included in the price. There are also some pitches with electricity. The area is under video surveillance with a 24 hour recording.

title: (36639) Cambados - 66 Lugar Facho
description: Quiet location, beach shower nearby, no service, no waves

title: (36639) Sartaxes - 7 Lugar Sartages
description: Facing the sea, beautiful view, quiet, a beach shower but not working (covid). Van 10m from the water. Perfect for the night.

title: (36636) Ribadumia -
description: There are beautiful restored mills. There is parking in the area, without services.

title: (36991) O Grove - 1 Rua Carreiro
description: Parking without restrictions in front of the golf club. Suitable for campers under 6 meters. Convenient to visit Grobits park quickly.  Continue towards the end of the island authorized parking

title: (36639) Cambados - Aldea o Facho
description: Ample parking space where Antea was a playground. Next to a soccer field and right by the sea. Quiet sleeping place under maple trees.

title: (36991) Isla de La Toja - s/n Paseo do Mar
title_short: (36991) Isla de La Toja - s/n Paseo do Mar
description: Parking next to the Louxo hotel. It's not much, but staying overnight if you're in the area is fine.

title: (36991) O Grove - 1 Rúa Don Pedro
description: Area under pine forest with lots of shade next to the bridge. Perfect for spending the day. At the entrance there is a sign prohibited except shellfish and guards, but in truth it is the parking lot of the nearby beach bar and the beach.

title: (36991) O Grove - Paseo do Mar
description: Parking with lots of space, there are parking lots for buses that can use large motorhomes, there are no services but these are next to where you take the tourist train and 5 minutes walk to the Toja Museum.

title: (36989) O Grove - 58 Rúa Castelao
description: Laundry

title: (36627) Vilanova de Arousa - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect for sleeping, bathing, and walking. There is a small factory nearby but the activity ceases at 10 pm, that is, zero noise.

title: (36989) O Grove - 15 Pasaje Monte Da Vila
title_short: (36989) O Grove - 15 Pasaje Monte Da Vila
description: Parking of the soccer field where there is usually room during the summer season because there is no soccer or school. To park near the center without being fined. To park and see the the perfect grove.

title: () Villanueva de Arosa - EP-9501
description: Esplanade next to the Umia River. River route departure. Easy access. Gas station, bar and bakery very close.

title: (36989) Ardia - Unnamed Road
description: Place to spend the night in a camper, next to skateboarding tracks, sunrise views of the estuary, space for one or two campers maximum. But behind it has parking.

title: (36989) O Grove - 89 Rúa Teniente Domínguez
description: Parking area next to the estuary, with a children's park and a fountain. Very quiet place even if early in the morning there is a little movement when shellfish come to slaughterhouse

title: (36980) El Grove - 2 Rúa Alexandre Bóveda
description: Perfect laundry. 3 washing machines of 12.15 and 20 kg. 3 dryers Coin change, drinking water available. Very clean and tidy place. Very affordable prices. The only flaw is the lack of parking.

title: (36627) Lugar As Brañas -
description: Great place to spend the night without problems. No noise and next to the sea

title: () Meaño - Aldea Altamira
description: Outdoor parking between trees and pond, near a kind of museum. Access from a dirt road accessible to CC. Nice point of view and free dump station nearby (see on park4night map)

title: (36967) A Eirexe - 3 Rúa Ramón Cabanillas
description: Free parking. Very large, many seats. Semi-asphalted ground, completely level. Very calm. Supermarket, laundry, restaurants, bars, etc. It does not have loading and unloading of water. Perfect for a stop along the way

title: (36967) Meaño - 10T Lugar Altamira
description: Os Pasales recreational area. 15 large parking spaces for vans, among shady trees. On the side of the area, next to the road, they can fit 2 AC parked in line. In the area there is a soccer field, paddle tennis court, 2 taps, stone tables and grills, benches, wastebaskets, and a wooden box with books to read (please put them back in their place). Gray discharge area a few meters next to the treatment plant.

title: (36967) Meaño - 12 Aldea Altamira
description: Gray and black water drainage area only, in the Dena area nearby you have a place to rest, a playground, a river walk and two minutes from supermarkets and cafes. The bin doesn’t get emptied very often so please empty any rubbish with food waste elsewhere so as not to attract lots of flies.

title: (36629) A Pantrigueira - 61 Lugar Pantrigueira de Arriba
title_short: (36629) A Pantrigueira - 61 Lugar Pantrigueira de Arriba
description: Washing of vehicles with possibility of loading water. They have a brush with two water rinsing areas inside the same box (the big one is perfect for a 6-meter van) so you can clean the windows and tires before washing under pressure. The washing pressure is excellent, waxed and very good (about 3 minutes for each euro). They are super nice and let fill with water if you wash the van. They do not have a specific emptying area for motorhomes (gray and black water), but they have a bathroom. Great place recommended before entering the island of Arousa or preparing the trip by leaving it.

title: (36627) Villanueva de Arosa - 38d PO-307
description: Free water at Eroski gas station

title: (36192) Armenteira - 53B Lugar a Vilar
description: Pilgrims hostel parking. Always accessible. Great place to see the monastery. Bar O Comercio, potato omelette. Not leveled. Drinking water is available.

title: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 39 Calle Terrón
description: Fantastic spot right on edge of the beach which is dog-friendly.  There are some shady spots under trees. Very level.  We spent a fabulous night here, two or three other vans nearby.  There is a chiringuito right by beach but is quiet at night.  To access, take the dirt track directly next to the garden centre which goes down behind the Hotel Dinajan.  Go to the left of the car park which says no campervans and the track takes you under the bridge and directly to the beach.

title: (36629) Vilanova de Arousa - PO-306
description: Large and quiet esplanade. Ideal for parking day and night without services. Great supermarket very close and very close to the beach. Several campsites nearby. You can walk to the village.

title: (36192) Armenteria - 3 Lugar a Caroi
description: Small car park, perfect for visiting the monastery and for mountain bike departures

name: Camping Paisaxe

description: Camper van emptying service area. pipe for filling

name: Camping El Terrón
title: (36629) Camping El Terrón
description: Camping El Terrón, the last of three campsites side by side. An old part with fixed caravans and a recent one for the classic campers. There the trees are still young and therefore offer little shade. Good sanitary but small. Water and electricity accessible to all places direct access to the beach, bar, restaurant in season. But barking dogs all night.

title: (36629) Vilanova de Arousa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for about 10 motorhomes without services but close to Vilanova and the beach. Seats long enough. It does not say that it is prohibited. (Only in narrow areas of passage in the area.) The road passes but with little traffic.

title: (36626) - s/n Barrio as Aceñas
description: Plan between trees on the beach, touching a campsite and near a nightclub. (loud music is heard until 2 in the morning approx). The rest is perfect.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
description: Beautiful picnic area with incomparable scenery.

name: Camping Salinas
title: (36626) Camping Salinas
description: Camping Salinas (2 stars), but with the bare essentials. Very clean bathrooms. Friendly and pleasant welcome. Direct access to the beach. The only downside I saw is the lack of closing time for the children's area, because if you have an adjacent property and want to sleep early you will have a hard time until around 12pm. Beach bar attached to the campsite and others along the beautiful 2 km long beach walk. Barbecue area with approx. 5 places.

address.street: Playa de Xestelas, Barrio as Aceñas, s/n

title: (36629) Vilanova de Arousa - Lgar. O Terrón S/n. (Entrada al campo de futbol)
title_short: (36629) Vilanova de Arousa - Lgar. O Terrón S/n. (Entrada al campo de futbol)
description: Motorhome overnight area. there's a big sliding door and if no one is there, go in the small door, phone the number, they speak English, and you can open the sliding door from inside. he said he'd be here at 5pm and to choose a place and connect to the electricity, which is 6A.

address.street: Lgar. O Terrón S/n. (Entrada al campo de futbol)

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
description: We pay 3€ to Park during the day and we where able to use the money in the bar. We spent the day.

title: (36629) Vilanova de Arousa - Unnamed Road
description: Small Parking in front of the Foot-ball place. Perfect to relax and swim

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - Carretera Po-M
description:
Good place, at the end of crossing the Illa Arousa bridge. Many motorhomes and well organized. ,.
We must respect the parking areas, do not remove chairs or tables as we can be very annoying and it is forbidden.
The bar there is a very good tapas and wine list at a good price and they are open until October.

name: Camping El Edén
title: (36626) Camping El Edén
description: Camping El Edén

title: (36626) Pontevedra - Carretera Po-M
description: Quiet green area to park during the day full of cars because the beach is very close. Right in front of the “El Edén” campsite, you can buy some things.

title: (36637) Galicia - 29 Lugar Zacande
description: Zacande soccer field parking (Meis), quiet place to spend the night. Next to the town and the Pazo de La Saleta. Wide and easy access from the PO-300.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 1 Lugar Bao
description: The Oasis Bar is closed, and the outside parking spaces are great for 3 ac. Inside it is forbidden to park. Much quieter than the ac area next to the bridge, as cars pass much further.

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa - 30 EP-9802
description: 2 places end of the road at the foot of the sea

title: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 17 Rúa O Cabo
title_short: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 17 Rúa O Cabo
description: Laudry shop to clean and dry.

title: (36969) Meaño - 13 Aldea Abuín
description: Service station with shower service very well maintained, super clean and very well priced. Area to park, wash, empty black and gray water with easy access. Open every day from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. every day of the year. Very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (36192) Pontevedra - Unnamed Road
description: Golf parking and departure of a mountain bike circuit of 7km (easy). I went to ask the reception of golf, which is also Info VTT, if there was opportunity to spend the night on the parking to do the circuit in the morning, and allowed me without any problem.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 1 Lugar Bao
description: Paved street behind the Oasis sports center and restaurant. Line parking drawn for 5m vehicles. We parked 3 days and stayed 2 nights. On weekends it gets full of cars but in the afternoon there are places. Very flat and with streetlights. Very quiet and 50 meters from the beach. Showers on the beach during lifeguard hours (12:30 to 20:00)

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa -
description: Parking for motorhomes and campers in a heavenly place. In this parking lot that borders the sea there is a tidal mill. Beaches and coves in the area.

title: (36988) San Vicente - 1 Lugar Gandariña
description: Parking to visit the Punta Moreias lighthouse during the day there are quite a few walkers ... at night very quiet, there is no service but you can easily enter the sea and there is an area of fairly smooth rocks to fish, we have visited it in August. Parking has some cost.

title: (36192) - 19 EP-9214
description: Some level parking spaces behind the stadium lonely place I would not stay there is my advice

title: (36988) O Grove - EP-9102
description: Nearby picnic area with tables and barbecue. In the picnic area there are a couple of garbage. Good views of the Ría de Arousa. Quiet to spend the night.

title: (36619) Vilagarcía de Arousa - Camiño Novo
description: Parking of the Lobeira Viewpoint. Quiet, flat parking, picnic area.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 10 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 10 Barrio as Aceñas
description: Beach front Park with sunset view. No services. Forbidden to spend a night. Ideal for 7 motorhomes.

title: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 32 Rúa A Basella
title_short: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 32 Rúa A Basella
description: Parking in front of the marina, ideal for spending the night. We spent one night, very quiet. Very cozy with Barés 2 minutes walk.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 29B Lugar As Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 29B Lugar As Aceñas
description: It is a street that ends in a pavilion, which goes down to the cove or accesses the viewpoint, there is room to park a total of about 6 - 8, plus a motorhome, it is paved and the upper area is level, right next to where those from Arenoso beach rent the canoes, which have a pine forest that they let you park if you rent a canoe to go to arenoso

name: Camping las Moreiras
title: (36988) Camping las Moreiras
description: Very small plots. Decent bathrooms and services. Noisy camp at night, until 00:00 there were children playing and shouting a lot.

title: (36969) Lores - 24 Lugar Lores
description: Very large parking in Lores. Perfect to do the route of the mills of the Chanca river. We have not spent the night but there is no sign that prohibits it.

title: (36969) Meaño - 16 Lugar Igrexa
description: Water point at the foot of the road with a small car park to stop. To the side is a hillside with grass and trees that provide shade. Ideal to make a stop.

title: (36988) - 20 Lugar Gandariña
description: Small parking lot next to a cove nice quiet place to spend the day we were there in April it was empty

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 3 Lugar Iglesario
description: Large parking lot across from the church and cemetery. Quiet road, nice view to the north.

title: (36626) Arousa - 28 Travesía Riason
description: Beautiful little place right on the beach. Easy access for AC camper. It is next to an industrial warehouse but there is no noise or smell. Beach bar a few meters away and several coves.

title: (36626) - 11A Lugar As Aceñas
description: Nice little place, just big enough for a van under 6 meters. Surrounded by the sea with breathtaking views. Forbidden from 22h to 6h.

title: (36988) O Grove - PO-316
description: Huge car park on the Lanzada beach. It is asphalt and without shade. If you get closer to the beach you can't hear the road. There is WC during the day.

title: (36988) A Lanzada - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the night. There is the road next to it but there is almost no traffic.

title: (36988) - 6 Lugar Gandariña
description: Quiet place on the beach where to spend the night, in mid-September there was no problem sleeping in the van. there are areas with shade in the morning, public toilets that close at night, and several beach bars where you can have a drink, it is not crowded but at rush hour it can be difficult to park

title: (36988) El Grove - 16 As Pipas
description: Place to spend the day and night. There is space for 4 vans or motorhomes. Right in front of the beach.

title: (36616) Penaboi -
description:
Large river beach parking area. The access is very narrow (approximately 2.5m wide), so it is not recommended for AC. The place is super quiet, next to the river and surrounded by trees and lots of shade. Fit at least 10 vans. Please take care of the environment and avoid leaving rubbish.
Neighbourgs are not friendly with visitors.

title: (36988) - 15C Lugar Gandariña
description: Parking between Praia area das Pipas and Praia Mexilloeira. Good views and next to two beautiful coves. You can stay overnight. Very calm. Maximum 4 campers and slight unevenness of the ground. Two minutes from a beach bar and Praia das Pipas area. I totally recommend it.

title: (36988) O Grove - 21 PO-317
description: Arrive first thing in the morning. Good place watching the sea. Ground parking. Shadow if you arrive on time

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 8 Avenida da Ponte
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 8 Avenida da Ponte
description: Express laundry on main street. Plenty of parking at the door to leave the motorhome and cafes in the vicinity to kill time while doing the laundry.

title: (36620) Villanueva de Arosa - 1 Avenida as Sinas
title_short: (36620) Villanueva de Arosa - 1 Avenida as Sinas
description: Parking the beach with plenty of shade. Go early or late as it fills up during the day. Next door a bar and a beach bar. You are on the same beach. We spent several nights with no problem. There is no prohibition sign of any kind. it has showers. Not recommended for long motorhomes. Up to 7m can go well.

title: (36990) - 173 Lugar a Lanzada
description: Huge parking for people who go to the huge beach of La Lanzada. No sign. Today we will sleep here together. 6 AC more.

title: (36988) - 14 Lugar Gandariña
description: Parking serving the beaches. Beautiful area. Magnificent view. No service. Nice beach next door. Nudist beach nearby (but not in sight). On the other hand a lot of wind. The corner is famous for the practice of kite surfing is not for nothing.

title: (36990) Sanjenjo - PO-308
description: Space with grass and camping tables for AC. In front of La Lanzada beach, there is a parking lot at the top for cars and a little further on is the entrance for this space. It does not have the views of the top, but it is quieter.

title: (36995) - 2 Camino A Escusa
description: Forest of secouyas. Fantastic views over the Ria de Pontevedra. Ideal place to rest and stroll in a forest of redwoods.

name: Camping & Glamping Muiñeira
title: (36988) Camping & Glamping Muiñeira
description: Small campsite with magnificent views. It has two areas, one on the beach and the other in a wooded area. Both areas have bathroom modules (very clean), sinks and laundry rooms. It has a washing machine and dryer. Free WIFI in the cafeteria. Nice treatment by the owners.

title: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 26 EP-9702
description: Parking on the dirt beach, we spent a quiet night there, another motorhome was present.

title: (36988) - 14 Lugar Gandariña
description: Very quiet, several coves in a row, and a path to walk, no showers or bathrooms

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - PO-308
description: Spectacular place to spend the day. Camping or spending the night is not allowed by order of SEPRONA, the Civil Guard passes by and if you have chairs or a table outside, they will fine you directly because you can only park. And if you stay overnight the Civil Guard will wake you up in the middle of the night with the gift of a fine and have to leave in the middle of the night

title: (36969) Pedrouzos - Unnamed Road
description:
Asphalt and level parking in a recreational area, with picnic tables, sports facilities and a children's playground
It has no services and is a twenty-five minute walk from the center of Sanxenxo

name: Camping Os Fieitás
title: (36988) Camping Os Fieitás
description: Os Fieitas Campsite

title: (36988) El Grove - PO-317
description: Ample free parking, there are very clean public toilets. There is the possibility of taking a shower at a nearby campsite, 18 minutes away on foot for an affordable price.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 134 Calle a Lanzada
description: Large lawn parking and next to a beach bar and the sea. From 22:00 to 09:00 is prohibited.

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa - 10 Barrio Testos
description: Small grassy place next to a small beach. Sunset and two other places a few meters with access to another small beach. Arrive early or after 6 p.m. to make sure you don't go around the island 3 times without finding a place in the afternoon. Only downside, the waste and other toilet paper left on the ground, like a little everywhere unfortunately ... please, do not leave anything on the floor.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 2 Rúa Palmeira
description: Self-service laundry 365 days a year From 8 to 22h

title: (36992) Pontevedra - 21 EP-9214
description: Viewpoint with space for 3 campers. Although next to the road, very quiet. In the shade of the restored ruins you can rest and enjoy the view. Slightly sloping terrain. No trash can.

title: (36988) San Vicente do Grove - 23 Lugar a Lanzada
title_short: (36988) San Vicente do Grove - 23 Lugar a Lanzada
description: Street with parking next to the Del Mar water. I don't know if you can stay the night but the place is beautiful. Better to go into reverse to park at the end of the street.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 1 Paseo Naval
description: Parking on edge of port in front of supermarket. Great for vans.

title: (36979) O Vinquiño - AG-41, km 19
description: Petrol station with LPG!

title: (36611) Vilagarcía de Arousa - 51 Rúa Preguntoiro
description: Parking on the public road, at the entrance of the town on a not very busy road. There is a playground, a beach 50m away, picnic tables, a fountain and a beach shower. Nice views of the estuary.

name: Área de autocaravanas illa de arousa

title_short: (36626) Área de autocaravanas illa de arousa
description: Motorhome area with provision of electricity, water, discharge of gray water and black water for motorhomes that spend the night in the area. laundry and super three minutes walk. It is recommended to call before coming. 626208482 or 675936131

description: 8 large parking spaces next to the IGAFA.

title: (36960) Sanjenjo - 24a Lugar Vinquiño
description: Free water fountain, all the locals fill their bottles

title: (36988) O Grove - Unnamed Road
description: Place for 2 vans along the sea between 2 beaches. Quiet with beautiful landscape. Direct access to the beach. ideal start for kayaking and to observe the shell farms more closely. No amenities.

description: Large free car park accessible by motorhome.  No water and electricity.

title: (36969) Sanxenxo - 24 PO-504

title: (36988) El Grove - 80 PO-317
description: Parking on the side of the road / street. You will have shade and many restaurants to eat. The beach is not supervised but it is great if you go with family.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - Camiño da Ermida da Lanzada
title_short: (36990) Sanxenxo - Camiño da Ermida da Lanzada
description: Very quiet parking between two beaches. (they are doing archaeological excavations next door, some noise in the morning) The bread van arrives at P. Fuente, which is opened with pliers. Spectacular views and sunset. very calm. fully recommended.

title: (36990) Sanxenxo - 2 Lugar Pontes
description: Drinking water fountain with two pipes. Water all year. It has an area to park the vehicle while you fill up. The locals fill their drums there

title: (36692) Barro - 42 Lugar Fonte de Curro
description: Gas station with emptying and filling of water

title: (36990) A Lanzada - 58 Lugar a Lanzada
description: Super quiet place. There is no one else staying  but there are some chalets right in front and a snack bar.

title: (36600) Villagarcía de Arosa - 15 Avenida Cambados
description: Modern self-service launderette with 4 machines and 4 dryers for 18kg each. There are tables and chairs, magazines, vending machines for drinks, a clean toilet and even a small indoor playground. On the other side of the street you can easily park in a supermarket car park and you can bridge the waiting time with a purchase.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - Unnamed Road
description: Little piece of land on the side of the road, next to the sea, quiet and with beautiful views. There is a path right next door with access to the beach.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - Unnamed Road

title: (36970) Sanxenxo - 32 Barrio Canelas
description: AUTOCAMPER SANXENXO. Private area for motorhomes Located 200 meters from Canelas beach and 2 km from the town of Portonovo. Lawn pitches with enough space to open the awning. Each plot has its own water and electricity connection. Common areas with outdoor tables, grills, sinks and sinks. Bathrooms, indoor and outdoor open showers. Two drain areas for black and gray water. Trampoline for children and animal park. The fishmonger comes in the morning. At the beach bar they have bread and pastries every morning, roast chickens and food. Very secure area with video surveillance. To book by phone or whatsapp

title: (36615) Caldas de Reyes - 11 N-640
description: Service station with water service and gray water emptying. It also has a spare gas bottle. The water tap has a great hose with a lot of pressure. Service station for gasoline with grocery store.

title: (36979) Sanxenxo - 4 Barrio Canelas
description: Amazing place to park close to the beach. There are public toilets on the beach and that's it. There's not even a bin nearby to put the rubbish out. There are a few supermarkets 10 min walking, restaurants and bars. Arrive early or after 20h to make sure you'll get a spot.
